structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS
Sec. 12-1025. - SALE OF MERCHANDISE ON SIDEWALKS.

law.text: It shall be unlawful, except pursuant to the provisions of ยง12-1024, for any person to expose, sell or to offer for sale any merchandise, cooked provisions, poultry, fruits, vegetables or other commodities upon any sidewalk in the City; provided that this section shall not prevent the sale of merchandise if the proceeds of such sales are used exclusively for religious, charitable or educational purposes, or [from] sidewalk cafes [which] are permitted in a pedestrian business overlay district.
